Name: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' that lead to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' directly following 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all final approval activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' that are preceded by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in relation to total declarations submitted
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' by 'org:resource'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' leading to a re-submission and eventual 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage reduction in 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' when followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' within two months after the trip
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in relation to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' for domestic declarations compared to international declarations
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' grouped by 'case:BudgetNumber'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' that result in 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' in cases requiring director approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' per month
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' made per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' activities
